title: Machine Learning
tagLine: Master the art of Machine Learning
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating universe of Machine Learning! Decode the complexities of algorithms and data with our expert instructors. Enroll now to pave the way for a future powered by cutting-edge technology!
overView: Start an extensive exploration of the machine learning domain with our course. Start with Python basics, advance to supervised and unsupervised learning, and explore algorithms like Linear Regression and Random Forests. Delve into captivating subjects such as Natural Language Processing and Neural Networks. Acquire practical skills by employing popular libraries for effective idea implementation. Culminate your learning journey with hands-on real-world projects crafted to refine your expertise in machine learning. Enhance your abilities with us and unleash your complete potential

faq.question: Catch Up with Python
faq.answer: Python basics & fundamentals & tools.

faq.question: Introduction To Machine Learning
faq.answer: What is machine learning, Applications of machine learning, Supervised vs Unsupervised Learning, Python libraires suitable for ML.

faq.question: Machine Learning Tools
faq.answer: Training& Testing, Cross validation, Features & labels, Pickings & Scaling, Techniques & Error metrics.

faq.question: Machine Learning Algorithms
faq.answer: Linear regression & Forecasting, Prediction using regression, Logistic regression & model evaluation, Support vector machines, K-N classification, K–means clustering, Random forest linear.

faq.question: Recommender Systems
faq.answer: Content based recommender systems, Collaborative Filtering.

faq.question: Natural Language Processing
faq.answer: Introduction to NLTK, BASICS & LAXICAL PROCESSING, Text Classification, stop words stemming lemmatization, named entity recognition, conduct sentiment analysis using Naïve bayes.

faq.question: Neural Networks & Deep Learning
faq.answer: Information & Training flow of neural network, Convolutional & Recurrent neural networks, Creating & Deploying networks using Tensorflow & Keras.

faq.question: Implementation
faq.answer: Implementation of all algorithms using sklern.

faq.question: MINOR & MAJOR PROJECTS
faq.answer: Minor Project, Major Project, Project Overview.

title: Web Development
tagLine: Master the art of Web Development
description: Dive into the world of web development! Unleash your potential, enroll today, and carve out a bright future shaping digital landscapes with our cutting-edge courses. Your coding journey awaits!
overView: Join our comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, OOP, DOM manipulation, jQuery, Node.js, and database principles, kickstarting your journey into web development. Delve into advanced concepts such as React.js, Angular, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and Node.js, culminating in hands-on projects of varying scales. Elevate your skills by building robust APIs and dynamic webpages. Explore the intricacies of modern web programming with us and turn your dream of becoming a coder into reality.

faq.answer: Intro to web Development & Webpage

faq.answer: Introduction to boot starp, installation & grid system, Forms button Icons integration Introduction to Saas and installation & variable nesting Creating a portfolio with webpage with header & footer Webpage with hero section & animations & responsive.

faq.answer: Basics, selectors, traversing, CSS, Events, ajax, DOM Introduction to Node js, modules, ES6 Modules, types of modules Building a server & Restful ApI Middleware functions & express framework.

faq.answer: Introduction to database & SQL, Create table, joining tables, delete & drop, Installing & using postre sql, SQL : insert, select, alter, update, conditional selection, function.

faq.answer: Introduction, Dom selectors, Events, background generator & background generator files.

faq.answer: Inheritance, constructors, destructors & encapsulation.

title: Cyber Security
tagLine: Master the art of Cyber Security
description: Dive into cybersecurity, enroll to strengthen skills, defend against threats, and secure a bright future in the digital world.
overView: Join our comprehensive course covering key concepts, network history, operating system basics, and ethical hacking principles to delve into the realm of cybersecurity. Explore techniques including scanning and reconnaissance, web server security, SQL injection, malware defense, social engineering, and wireless network security. Equip yourself with the necessary tools to identify, prevent, and manage online threats. Learn in a hands-on, immersive environment that combines theory and practical skills, ensuring readiness for the dynamic cybersecurity industry.

title: Cloud Computing
tagLine: Master the art of Cloud Computing
description: Enroll in our Cloud Computing program to explore the future of technology and ensure a bright tomorrow!
overView: Cloud computing is a paradigm that delivers computing services, including storage, processing power, and software applications, over the internet. It offers various service models such as Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS), allowing users to access resources on-demand without the need for managing physical hardware. Deployment models include public, private, and hybrid clouds, each offering different levels of control and customization. Cloud computing provides benefits such as scalability, cost-efficiency, flexibility, and accessibility, but also presents challenges related to security, reliability, and vendor lock-in. Overall, it revolutionizes IT infrastructure by enabling organizations to efficiently utilize resources and focus on innovation and business growth.

title: VLSI
description: Explore the world of robotics, unlock your potential, enroll now, and pave the way for a bright future where innovation and automation combine for unparalleled opportunities!
overView: Embark on a groundbreaking journey into robotics with our comprehensive course. Uncover the intricacies of robot design, from laws and types to essential components. Harness the power of the ATmega 328p microcontroller to seamlessly integrate sensors and actuators. Master Arduino programming for precise control of stepper, servo, and DC motors. Explore communication protocols like Bluetooth, SPI, and I2C, immersing yourself in the potential of ROS for intricate robotic maneuvers. Conclude your learning adventure with a hands-on project showcasing your expertise. Ignite your passion for innovation and robotics like never before!

title: IOT
description: Explore robotics now to unlock your potential and open doors to a future where innovation and automation bring endless opportunities!
overView: Join our comprehensive course and dive into the realm of robotics, taking a revolutionary step forward. Explore the laws, types, and components of robot design while mastering the ATmega 328p microcontroller for sensor and actuator integration. Learn to program Arduino devices for various motors and uncover communication methods like Bluetooth, SPI, and I2C. Immerse yourself in the potential of ROS for advanced robotic movements. Conclude with a practical project to showcase your acquired knowledge and ignite your enthusiasm for innovation in robotics!
